title: How to Make Rosewater Rice

steps.headline: Place a deep frying pan over high heat.
steps.description: Add the butter and let melt.

steps.headline: Add in the rice, sesame seeds, and smoked paprika.
steps.description: Mix thoroughly with the melted butter.

steps.headline: Pour in the water and rosewater.
steps.description: Bring to a boil until holes form in the rice.

steps.headline: Reduce heat to low.
steps.description: Cover the pan and let sit for 40 minutes.

steps.headline: Remove pan from heat at the 40 minute mark.
steps.description: Fluff rice with a fork, then garnish with pine nuts and more paprika.

text: Place a deep frying pan over high heat. Add the butter and let melt. Add in the rice, sesame seeds, and smoked paprika. Mix thoroughly with the melted butter. Pour in the water and rosewater. Bring to a boil until holes form in the rice. Reduce heat to low. Cover the pan and let sit for 40 minutes. Remove pan from heat at the 40 minute mark. Fluff rice with a fork, then garnish with pine nuts and more paprika.
